results.9-9: The Disappearances of Half Hollow (vomerine tooth of a Large toad)
results.10-10: Legendry of Phantoms and Ghosts (obsidian human molar)
results.11-11: The Thousand Deaths of Jander Sunstar (yellowed vampire fang)
results.13-13: Three Bridges to the Sky (lapis lazuli oni fang)
results.14-14: The Claws of Dragotha (broken translucent fang)
results.15-15: Ashes of the Ages and Eternal Fire (jade humanoid bicuspid)
results.16-16: Daughters of Bel (green steel pit fiend fang)
results.17-17: Why the Sky Screams (blue dragon fang)
results.18-18: The Last Tarrasque (jagged sliver of tarrasque tooth)

results.1-1: A mummified goblin hand
results.2-2: A piece of crystal that faintly glows in the moonlight
results.3-3: A gold coin minted in an unknown land
results.4-4: A diary written in a language you don’t know
results.5-5: A brass ring that never tarnishes
results.6-6: An old chess piece made from glass
results.7-7: A pair of knucklebone dice, each with a skull symbol on the side that would normally show six pips
results.8-8: A small idol depicting a nightmarish creature that gives you unsettling dreams when you sleep near it
results.9-9: A rope necklace from which dangles four mummified elf fingers
results.10-10: The deed for a parcel of land in a realm unknown to you
results.11-11: A 1-ounce block made from an unknown material
results.12-12: A small cloth doll skewered with needles
results.13-13: A tooth from an unknown beast
results.14-14: An enormous scale, perhaps from a dragon
results.16-16: An old divination card bearing your likeness
results.17-17: A glass orb filled with moving smoke
results.18-18: A 1-pound egg with a bright red shell
results.20-20: A glass jar containing a weird bit of flesh floating in pickling fluid
results.21-21: A tiny gnome-crafted music box that plays a song you dimly remember from your childhood
results.22-22: A small wooden statuette of a smug halfling
results.23-23: A brass orb etched with strange runes
results.25-25: A tiny silver icon of a raven
results.26-26: A bag containing forty-seven humanoid teeth, one of which is rotten
results.27-27: A shard of obsidian that always feels warm to the touch
results.28-28: A dragon’s bony talon hanging from a plain leather necklace
results.30-30: A blank book whose pages refuse to hold ink, chalk, graphite, or any other substance or marking
results.31-31: A silver badge in the shape of a five-pointed star
results.32-32: A knife that belonged to a relative
results.33-33: A glass vial filled with nail clippings
results.34-34: A rectangular metal device with two tiny metal cups on one end that throws sparks when wet
results.35-35: A white, sequined glove sized for a human
results.36-36: A vest with one hundred tiny pockets
results.38-38: A tiny sketch portrait of a goblin
results.39-39: An empty glass vial that smells of perfume when opened
results.40-40: A gemstone that looks like a lump of coal when examined by anyone but you
results.41-41: A scrap of cloth from an old banner
results.42-42: A rank insignia from a lost legionnaire
results.43-43: A tiny silver bell without a clapper
results.44-44: A mechanical canary inside a gnome-crafted lamp
results.45-45: A tiny chest carved to look like it has numerous feet on the bottom
results.46-46: A dead sprite inside a clear glass bottle
results.47-47: A metal can that has no opening but sounds as if it is filled with liquid, sand, spiders, or broken glass (your choice)
results.48-48: A glass orb filled with water, in which swims a clockwork goldfish
results.49-49: A silver spoon with an M engraved on the handle
results.50-50: A whistle made from gold-colored wood
results.51-51: A dead scarab beetle the size of your hand
results.52-52: Two toy soldiers, one with a missing head
results.53-53: A small box filled with different-sized buttons
results.54-54: A candle that can’t be lit
results.55-55: A tiny cage with no door
results.58-58: A hilt from a broken sword
results.61-61: A cameo carved in the likeness of a hideous person
results.62-62: A silver skull the size of a coin
results.64-64: A pyramid of sticky black incense that smells very bad
results.65-65: A nightcap that, when worn, gives you pleasant dreams
results.66-66: A single caltrop made from bone
results.67-67: A gold monocle frame without the lens
results.68-68: A 1-inch cube, each side painted a different color
results.69-69: A crystal knob from a door
results.70-70: A small packet filled with pink dust
results.71-71: A fragment of a beautiful song, written as musical notes on two pieces of parchment
results.72-72: A silver teardrop earring made from a real teardrop
results.73-73: The shell of an egg painted with scenes of human misery in disturbing detail
results.74-74: 一把打开时能看到一只睡猫的折扇
results.76-76: A four-leaf clover pressed inside a book discussing manners and etiquette
results.77-77: A sheet of parchment upon which is drawn a complex mechanical contraption
results.78-78: An ornate scabbard that fits no blade you have found so far
results.79-79: An invitation to a party where a murder happened
results.80-80: A bronze pentacle with an etching of a rat’s head in its center
results.81-81: A purple handkerchief embroidered with the name of a powerful archmage
results.82-82: Half of a floor plan for a temple, castle, or some other structure
results.83-83: A bit of folded cloth that, when unfolded, turns into a stylish cap
results.84-84: A receipt of deposit at a bank in a far-flung city
results.85-85: A diary with seven missing pages
results.86-86: An empty silver snuffbox bearing an inscription on the surface that says “dreams”
results.87-87: An iron holy symbol devoted to an unknown god
results.88-88: A book that tells the story of a legendary hero’s rise and fall, with the last chapter missing
results.92-92: 一枚矮人设计的华丽胸针
results.93-93: 一个空的红酒瓶，其上面有一枚漂亮的酒标写着：“美酒巫师庄园,卓越红龙汁，331422-W”
results.94-94: 一块多彩釉质表面的马赛克瓦
results.96-96: 一面装饰着龙骷髅和交叉骨头的黑色海盗旗
results.97-97: 一只不被观察就会活动的小金属蟹或蜘蛛
results.98-98: 一只装有荤油的玻璃罐其标签上写着“狮鹫油”
results.99-99: 一只陶底木盒内装着一条两头都长着脑袋的活蠕虫
results.100-100: A metal urn containing the ashes of a hero

Undead Desires.name: Undead Desires
Undead Desires.description: Some desired offering options for an undead.

results.1-1: 一小瓶血
results.2-2: A personal memento from the creature’s past
results.3-3: Materials, tools, or the skills to sun-proof a crumbling mausoleum
results.4-4: Completing a task the creature was unable to finish in life

results.1-1: Throwing a silver orb through an ancient arch
results.2-2: Spilling a pint of humanoid blood
results.3-3: Calling the name of a specific archfey three times
results.4-4: Wearing the regalia of a lost royal dynasty
results.5-5: Permanently sacrificing a memory of joy
results.6-6: Being the descendant of a legendary hero

Unraveling Magic Effects.name: Unraveling Magic Effects
Unraveling Magic Effects.description: An effect that can occur when in a supernatural Unraveling Magic region.

results.1-5: All magic items in the region temporarily lose their magical properties, becoming nonmagical for 1 hour. Artifacts are unaffected. When the items regain their magic, a creature’s attunement to any of them is restored.
results.6-10: The region becomes a dead-magic zone for 1 hour. For the duration, the entire region is affected by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Eon0jzGzQRNluTPQ]{antimagic field} spell.
results.11-15: One random creature in the region must succeed on a [[/save dexterity dc=15]] saving throw or be enclosed in Otiluke’s @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1ADstb0Xec6HHRcU]{resilient sphere} for 1 minute.
results.16-20: One random creature in the region that has expended spell slots regains one expended spell slot of a random level.
results.21-25: Flares of magical energy flash through the region for 1 minute. For the duration, each round on initiative count 20 (losing all ties) one random creature in the region takes 2d4 damage of a type determined by a [[/r 1d6]]: 1, [[/damage 2d4 type=acid]]{acid}; 2, [[/damage 2d4 type=cold]]{cold}; 3, [[/damage 2d4 type=fire]]{fire}; 4, [[/damage 2d4 type=force]]{force}; 5, [[/damage 2d4 type=lightning]]{lightning}; or 6, [[/damage 2d4 type=thunder]]{thunder}.
results.26-30: One of the characters in the region must succeed on a [[/save wisdom dc=15]] saving throw or be transformed into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.jOANE6M0My6UJF4e]{blink dog}, as if by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]{polymorph} spell. The spell lasts for 1 hour or until dispelled.
results.31-35: One random creature in the region that has spell slots expends one spell slot of a random level in a harmless shower of sparks and sounds.
results.36-40: All fire in the region freezes into ice that gives off a blue light equal to the illumination it normally provides. In addition, the region radiates extreme cold (see the Dungeon Master’s Guide) for 1 day.
results.41-45: One random creature in the region with spell slots becomes a focal point for ambient magic for 1 hour. At the end of each of the creature’s turns, other creatures within 10 feet of it must succeed on a [[/save dexterity]] saving throw against the spellcaster’s spell save DC or take [[/damage 1d6 type=force]] damage.
results.46-50: The @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.FjYE214HTERCRZNm]{flaming sphere} spell ([[/save dexterity dc=15]]) spontaneously activates in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the party. On initiative count 20 (losing all ties), the sphere moves 30 feet toward the nearest creature. The sphere vanishes after 1 minute.
results.51-55: Simple or martial weapons in the region that are nonmagical crackle with power. For 1 hour, they become magic weapons that grant a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with them.
results.56-60: Swirling energy surrounds one random creature in the region for 24 hours. For the duration, the creature gains resistance to force damage and its speed is reduced by 10 feet.
results.61-65: Each character in the region suddenly learns some magic. A character learns one wizard cantrip of the character’s choice and knows the cantrip for [[/r 1d8]] days.
results.66-70: One random creature in the region crackles with sparks of light for 1 hour. For the duration, the creature magically sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. In addition, any creature it touches (requiring an unarmed strike if the target is unwilling) takes [[/damage 1d6 type=force]] damage.
results.71-75: Lightning arcs in a 5-foot wide line between two creatures in the region that are within 30 feet of each other and not behind total cover. Each creature in the line (including the two) must make a [[/save dexterity dc=13]] saving throw, taking [[/damage 4d6 type=lightning]] damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
results.76-80: The @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ERCv7yuRkQ0YjGx6]{reverse gravity} spell ([[/save dexterity dc=18]]) activates for 1 minute, centered on the ground beneath one random creature in the region.
results.81-85: On initiative count 20 (losing all ties), two random creatures in the region must each make a [[/save charisma dc=15]] saving throw. If either save fails, the creatures magically teleport, switching places. If both saves succeed, they don’t teleport.
results.86-90: One random creature in the region breaks spells for 1 hour. Whenever anyone within 20 feet of the creature casts a spell, the spellcaster must succeed on a DC 15 saving throw using its spellcasting ability, or the spell drains away without effect. The spell slot, charge, or feature use that powered the spell is wasted.
results.91-95: During the next 24 hours, the first time a creature in the region targets another creature with a spell, the caster must make a DC 11 saving throw using its spellcasting ability. On a failed save, the spell targets the caster instead. On a successful save, the spell functions normally. This effect then ends.
results.96-100: One random creature in the region can suddenly cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{wish} spell once, within the next minute. Reroll if you’ve rolled this effect in the past 24 hours.

Wild Magic Eruption.name: Wild Magic Eruption
Wild Magic Eruption.description:
The magical energy roiling inside you sometimes erupts from you. When you enter your rage, roll on the Wild Magic table to determine the magical effect produced.

If the effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier.

results.1-1: Shadowy tendrils lash around you. Each creature of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you must succeed on a [[/save ability=con]] saving throw or take [[/damage 1d12 type=necrotic]] damage. You also gain [[/r 1d12#Temporary Hit Points]] temporary hit points.
results.2-2: You teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Until your rage ends, you can use this effect again on each of your turns as a bonus action.
results.3-3: An intangible spirit, which looks like a flumph or a pixie (your choice), appears within 5 feet of one creature of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you. At the end of the current turn, the spirit explodes, and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a [[/save ability=dex]] saving throw or take [[/damage 1d6 type=force]] damage. Until your rage ends, you can use this effect again, summoning another spirit, on each of your turns as a bonus action.
results.4-4: Magic infuses one weapon of your choice that you are holding. Until your rage ends, the weapon’s damage type changes to force, and it gains the light and thrown properties, with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. If the weapon leaves your hand, the weapon reappears in your hand at the end of the current turn.
results.5-5: Whenever a creature hits you with an attack roll before your rage ends, that creature takes [[/damage 1d6 type=force]] damage, as magic lashes out in retribution.
results.6-6: Until your rage ends, you are surrounded by multicolored, protective lights; you gain a +1 bonus to AC, and while within 10 feet of you, your allies gain the same bonus.
results.7-7: Flowers and vines temporarily grow around you; until your rage ends, the ground within 15 feet of you is difficult terrain for your enemies.
results.8-8: A bolt of light shoots from your chest. Another creature of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you must succeed on a [[/save ability=con]] saving throw or take [[/damage 1d6 type=radiant]] damage and be blinded until the start of your next turn. Until your rage ends, you can use this effect again on each of your turns as a bonus action.

Wild Magic Surge.name: Wild Magic Surge
Wild Magic Surge.description: If the result is a spell, it is too wild to be affected by your Metamagic, and if it normally requires concentration, it doesn’t require concentration in this case; the spell lasts for its full duration.

results.1-2: Roll on this table at the start of each of your turns for the next minute, ignoring this result on subsequent rolls.
results.3-4: For the next minute, you can see any &Reference[invisible] creature if you have line of sight to it.
results.5-6: A modron chosen and controlled by the DM appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
results.7-8:
You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]{fireball} as a 3rd-level spell centered on yourself.
Saving throw: [[/save dex dc=@attributes.spelldc]]
Damage: [[/damage 8d6 type=fire]]
results.9-10:
You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]{magic missile} as a 5th-level spell.
Darts: 7
Damage: [[/damage 1d4+1 type=force]]
results.11-12: Roll a [[/r d10]]. Your height changes by a number of inches equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you shrink. If the roll is even, you grow.
results.13-14: You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{confusion} centered on yourself.<hr />Saving throw: [[/save wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]]
results.15-16: For the next minute, you regain [[/healing 5 type=healing]]{5 hit points} at the start of each of your turns.
results.17-18: You grow a long beard made of feathers that remains until you sneeze, at which point the feathers explode out from your face.
results.19-20: You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.etgcR9wqmrhyZ0tx]{grease} centered on yourself.<hr />Saving throw: [[/save dex dc=@attributes.spelldc]]
results.21-22: Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the next spell you cast in the next minute that involves a saving throw.
results.23-24: Your skin turns a vibrant shade of blue. A &Reference[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{remove curse} spell can end this effect.
results.25-26: An eye appears on your forehead for the next minute. During that time, you have advantage on &Reference[perception]{Wisdom (Perception)} checks that rely on sight.
results.27-28: For the next minute, all your spells with a casting time of 1 action have a casting time of 1 bonus action.
results.29-30: You teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see.
results.31-32: You are transported to the Astral Plane until the end of your next turn, after which time you return to the space you previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
results.33-34: Maximize the damage of the next damaging spell you cast within the next minute.
results.35-36: Roll a [[/r d10]]. Your age changes by a number of years equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you get younger (minimum 1 year old). If the roll is even, you get older.
results.37-38: [[/r 1d6]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeFlumph000000]{flumphs} controlled by the DM appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of you and are &Reference[frightened] of you. They vanish after 1 minute.
results.41-42: You turn into a potted plant until the start of your next turn. While a plant, you are &Reference[incapacitated] and have vulnerability to all damage. If you drop to 0 hit points, your pot breaks, and your form reverts.
results.43-44: For the next minute, you can teleport up to 20 feet as a bonus action on each of your turns.
results.47-48: A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.G9PENY6nw0xRxCJW]{unicorn} controlled by the DM appears in a space within 5 feet of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
results.49-50: You can’t speak for the next minute. Whenever you try, pink bubbles float out of your mouth.
results.51-52: A spectral shield hovers near you for the next minute, granting you a +2 bonus to AC and immunity to @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]{magic missile}.
results.53-54: You are immune to being intoxicated by alcohol for the next [[/r 5d6]] days.
results.55-56: Your hair falls out but grows back within 24 hours.
results.57-58: For the next minute, any flammable object you touch that isn’t being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame.
results.59-60: You regain your lowest-level expended spell slot.
results.61-62: For the next minute, you must shout when you speak.
results.63-64: You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.IBJmWjzbQGu7M4UX]{fog cloud} centered on yourself.
results.65-66: Up to three creatures you choose within 30 feet of you take [[/damage 4d10 type=lightning]] damage.
results.67-68: You are &Reference[frightened] by the nearest creature until the end of your next turn.
results.69-70: Each creature within 30 feet of you becomes &Reference[invisible] for the next minute. The invisibility ends on a creature when it attacks or casts a spell.
results.71-72: You gain &Reference[damageresistance]{resistance} to all damage for the next minute.
results.73-74: A random creature within 60 feet of you becomes &Reference[poisoned] for [[/r 1d4]] hours.
results.75-76: You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius for the next minute. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you is &Reference[blinded] until the end of its next turn.
results.77-78: You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]{polymorph} on yourself. If you fail the saving throw, you turn into a sheep for the spell’s duration.<hr />Saving throw: [[/save wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]]
results.81-82: You can take one additional action immediately.
results.79-80: Illusory butterflies and flower petals flutter in the air within 10 feet of you for the next minute.
results.83-84: Each creature within 30 feet of you takes [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage. You regain hit points equal to the sum of the necrotic damage dealt.
results.87-88: You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]{fly} on a random creature within 60 feet of you.
results.89-90: You become &Reference[invisible] for the next minute. During that time, other creatures can’t hear you. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.
results.91-92: If you die within the next minute, you immediately come back to life as if by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zMEo5DKK8uxsuWnq]{reincarnate} spell.
results.93-94: Your size increases by one size category for the next minute.
results.95-96: You and all creatures within 30 feet of you gain &Reference[damageresistance]{vulnerability} to piercing damage for the next minute.
results.97-98: You are surrounded by faint, ethereal music for the next minute.
results.99-100: You regain all expended sorcery points.
